title: Analysis and Application of Training Methods for Cultivating Advanced Language Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental professional field knowledge
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on enhancing professional language utilization skills in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Ability to compare and explain the characteristics and application conditions of 13 training methods (case studies, role-playing, simulations, etc.)
Ability to select optimal training methods aligned with learning objectives (knowledge/skills/attitudes) and environmental constraints (cost/time/technology)
Implementation of instructional design applying training methods to real-world professional language scenarios through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
